titleStmt.title: Two new novels ... translated out of the French by P.B.G.
titleStmt.author: La Chapelle, M. de (Jean), 1655-1723. Langage müet. English.
Brilhac, Jean-Baptiste de. Agnès de Castro. English.
Belon, P. (Peter)
Du Vignau, sieur des Joanots. Secrétaire turc. English.

notesStmt.note: Each novel has special t.p. and separate paging. Both novels translated out of the French by Peter Belon. The first, a translation of: Le langage müet, is an extract from: Secrétaire turc / sieur de Du Vignau.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
Entry cancelled for F540 in Wing (2nd ed.).

(from t.p.) I. The art of making love without speaking, writing or enterview of the lovers / [M. de La Chapelle] -- II. The fatal beauty of Agnes de Castro, taken out of the history of Portugal / [J.-B. de Brilhac].
